name: The Lonesome Biker
description:
Your task is to finish the track as fast as possible, while avoiding any obstacle in your way. How fast can you go?

This is a game I made for the Weekly Game Jam - Week 204, with the theme: Downhill

  • Name: The Lonesome Biker

My first time:

  1. Game-Jam release
  2. publishing of a Game
  3. using Godot
  4. using Pixelart.

 yeah I'm kinda new :D

It was a fun and exciting experience. I hope you enjoy my little game.
